CustomField.description: This field is optional. It is populated by a user or a data integration. It indicates the type of documentation that the Owner-Documented Foreign Financial Institution (FFI) will provide (either an independent law firm's audit letter, or other alternative reporting statements), as prescribed by IRS forms W-8.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates type of documentation that the Owner-Documented Foreign Financial Institution (FFI) will provide (either an independent law firm's audit letter, or other alternative reporting statements), as prescribed by IRS forms W-8.
CustomField.label: Form W8 FFI Documentation Type
